Name: Peppered
About the game: Peppered is a real-time strategy game about snowball fights! You command a group of friends in snowball fights against kids around the neighborhood. Make them scoop up snow, let them throw snowball at opponents and build snow walls to defend yourself. Features ~30min playtime 4 challengers Each time a kid gets hit they will become colder and colder. If they become too cold they'll run home crying. However, each side has a campfire where they can warm-up and 'recover'. Extinguishing the opponent's campfire first can pay-off later! Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
